Football
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: A class-action lawsuit says the current players and the N.F.L. are shutting retired players out of negotiations to end a lockout and agree to a labor deal.
snippet: A class-action lawsuit says the current players and the N.F.L. are shutting retired players out of negotiations to end a lockout and agree to a labor deal.
